alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:34PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pima and west central Cochise Counties through 1015 PM MST... At 934 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tombstone, or 15 miles southeast of Benson, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson, St. David, Tombstone, Kartchner Caverns State Park and Fairbank. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 307 and 318. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 316. Route 82 between mile markers 57 and 67. Route 90 between mile markers 291 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
